title: Word Set
description: A *WordSet* is a set of related lexemes across languages. This could be a cognate set, a loandword set, or some other crosslinguistic grouping.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of object. Must be set to `WordSet`.

items.title: Lexemes
items.description: A collection of DatabaseReferences to lexemes in this Word Set.

items.title: Lexeme
items.description: A DatabaseReference to a lexeme in this Word Set

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: A collection of notes about this Word Set

items.title: Note
items.description: A note about this Word Set

reconstructedForm.title: Reconstructed Form
reconstructedForm.description: A DatabaseReference to the lexeme which is the reconstructed form for this word set (cognate set).

wordsetType.title: WordSet Type
wordsetType.description: The type of set to which this collection of lexemes belongs.
